aiAgents.title: Autonomous Browser Agents

aiAgents.footnote: Core value: end-to-end reasoning plus reliable execution loops

workflow.title: High-Precision Workflow Automation
workflow.summary: Composable primitives, coroutine-level safety, and elastic recovery for long-running work.
workflow.footnote: Strength: always-on automation with graceful recovery

intelligence.summary: Hybrid of LLM, ML, and selectors for clean data across chaotic pages.
intelligence.footnote: No brittle rules—auto adapts to each site

security.title: Scale + Anti-Detection
security.summary: Behavioral simulation, multi-layer defense, and elastic scheduling keep throughput high.

useCases.label: real-world plays
useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Typical Browser4 AI Agent deployments
useCases.benefit1: Agents navigate, extract, and stitch data automatically
useCases.benefit2: 100k ~ 200k pages/day per node with near-real-time monitoring
useCases.benefit3: Full API + workflow tooling for systems integration

case1.title: Automated Research & Massive Data Collection
case1.description: Agents auto-search across platforms, pull prices, and monitor changes. A single Browser4 node can visit 100k ~ 200k pages per day and structure data with built-in ML, boosting research efficiency by thousands of times.
case1.example: An e-commerce team collects hundreds of thousands of product records daily and auto-builds reports to guide merchandising.

case2.title: AI-Driven Interactive Experiences
case2.description: Pair LLMs with browser agents to read, summarize, and act on content. Agents reason across pages, compare insights, and behave like a 24/7 AI analyst.
case2.example: Many viral social videos showcase agents autonomously completing complex browsing, comparison, and synthesis tasks.

case3.title: Prospecting & Data Enrichment
case3.description: Crawl directories, event registries, and company sites to build or enrich CRM records and surface prospects fast.
case3.example: One customer gathers 30k leads daily from Google, merges multilingual sources automatically, and accelerates sales coverage.

case4.title: Workflow Automation (WFA)
case4.description: Hands-off flows for login, invoice downloads, forms, uploads, and system-to-system sync.
case4.example: A finance team automates bank reconciliation with Browser4, saving dozens of hours monthly and driving error rates to zero.

case5.title: Quality Assurance & Testing
case5.description: Run E2E tests in production-like environments, simulate geo-specific users, and monitor critical paths 24/7.
case5.example: Automated tests for payments, auth, and cross-border checkout keep customer journeys safe.

videoDemos.label: video demos
videoDemos.title: See Browser4 in Action
videoDemos.subtitle: Real footage of agents collecting data and comparing products.

video1.title: Browser4 demo - product comparison
video1.description: Demonstrates how Browser4 agents search Amazon, capture product specs, and stack-rank items side by side.
video1.note1: Live navigation across Amazon results pages
video1.note2: Automatic attribute extraction and comparison highlights
video1.note3: Great fit for commerce and sourcing analysts

video2.title: Browser4: Build an Army of Virtual Agents
video2.description: Shows PulsarAgents automating web data extraction and annotation so teams can export into Excel, HTML, or SQL instantly.
video2.note1: Provide a list page link, then crawl every product detail
video2.note2: Generate structured tables with zero manual tagging
video2.note3: Ideal for turning messy sites into business-ready datasets

painPoints.label: Current ecosystem pain points

painPoints.bullet2: Lack of searchable directories to match needs
painPoints.bullet3: Fragmented publishing + distribution with no standards

coevolution.title: Co-evolution
coevolution.text: Websites proactively support agents with friendlier data surfaces and interactions

mission.title: Browser4 Mission
mission.text: The agent era is already here. Browser4 is building a fair, sustainable ecosystem where AI can make autonomous decisions and act reliably, accelerating the shift toward an agentic internet.
